definition: thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The ice cap is 40% thinner than 40 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 冰川厚度比40年前薄了四成。

sentences.english: We have to get the thickness of the outline to match the thickness of the tree and cloud lines.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經取得的厚度輪廓匹配厚度的樹和雲線。

sentences.english: We have to get the thickness of the outline to match the thickness of the tree and cloud lines.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經取得的厚度輪廓匹配厚度的樹和雲線。

sentences.english: Thickness and quality of the glass are impressive.
sentences.chinese: 透鏡的厚度和質量令人印象深刻。

sentences.english: A method for determining both the optical constants and the thickness of thin films from transmission spectrum has been presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了確定透明均勻薄膜光學常數和厚度的方法。

sentences.english: The relative thickness of the frost layer on both surfaces obey the natural logarithm law.
sentences.chinese: 兩種表面霜層相對厚度呈自然對數分佈。

sentences.english: In addition, the stack tray can be easily dried since single deck thickness is reduced.
sentences.chinese: 另外，層疊式托盤降低了單層厚度，易於乾燥。

sentences.english: Graphene is a two-dimensional sheet of carbon that is only one atom thick.
sentences.chinese: 石墨烯是一種只有一個原子厚度的二維薄碳片。

sentences.english: The thickness of bracket joint has less influence over the maximum equivalent stress of joints.
sentences.chinese: 角板厚度對接頭處的最大米塞斯應力影響較小。

sentences.english: Normalizing treatment and product thickness affect magnetic property little in this experiment.
sentences.chinese: 試驗中，常化和產品厚度對產品磁性能的影響不明顯。

sentences.english: As a resul t, nacre thickness is sometimes just a cosmetic layer t hat can wear thin over time.
sentences.chinese: 所以真珠質的厚度就像臉上化妝品，不久就會磨薄了。

sentences.english: In most of the fovea, the thickness increased.
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數中心凹厚度增加。

sentences.english: Caliper board for aluminum, general 12 mm thickness is usually to 15 mm.
sentences.chinese: 測徑板一般爲鋁製，厚度通常爲12毫米至15毫米。

sentences.english: Objective To study different thick agarose gel how to impact the DNA electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究不同厚度的瓊脂糖凝膠對電泳的影響。

sentences.english: Here L is the thickness of the bubble wrap. Solving for L
sentences.chinese: 此處的L是指汽泡紙的厚度。

sentences.english: Check to ensure the mortar pad is thick enough and if not, add more pads till it is enough.
sentences.chinese: 檢查砂漿墊塊厚度是否準確，並根據需要墊夠。

definition: thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress
to favor one and discriminate against the other (abbr. for 厚此薄彼[hou4 ci3 bo2 bi3])
meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near
